list.s: And then it dawned on me: Here I am sitting in my warm comfortable office, looking out over the Stanford campus on a beautiful Saturday afternoon.
She let up the drain and pulled a warm towel close to her shivering body.
A warm day with not too much humidity and just enough wind.
That warm fuzzy feeling that you get when you are loved.
Wrapped in a warm, fluffy quilt.
Warm hands turn him over.
Warm water.
Not to worry, I’ll keep you safe and warm.
Her wrist, when I grabbed it, was smooth and strong and warm in my fingers.
A warm breeze came from silent vents above me.
The proverbial hospitality and warm welcome are still here.

Your reward will be the wag of a tail you’ll never see, the soft purr you’ll never hear -- and the warm joy of knowing you were there to help when you were needed.
Immediately, I felt it grow warm and knew that I had done something very stupid.
The stone was as warm as human flesh now, and there was a sort of glow that might have been light or just the stone’s soft heat, I don’t know.
I was content to let myself drift away, and I had almost forgotten the body lying with broken neck on the cathedral’s hard tiles when I felt a warm touch on its cheek.
Though they resemble squashes, they are natives to Asia, rather than the Americas, but are now cultivated in many regions of the world that boast moderate to warm climates.
